info.name: Rearrange userstyles.org home page
info.description: Arranges "Highes rated" on top in two columns and "Recently updated" underneath it in two columns. Change [ #sidebar > ul ] to just  [ #sidebar ] for side-by-side single-columms of each.

data.title: Nice layout. You can also use #sidebar { float: no
This is awesome, especially with LouCypher's adjus
Much better than the original layout.
